summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 25, J.J. McGilvra's 3rd Supplemental Addition, and block 35, Loch Givlra Addition, being the alley between 42nd Avenue North and 43rd Avenue North, from East Lynn Street to East Newton Street, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 103602 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
